Text:
Note: Make Sure you have at least 4GB or more of free space on Local C: because the image will
rebuild in My Documents. You can't browse for another location for some reason. When done you can opt to move the file to a different hard drive. Burn with Dvd Decrypter....peace

Please make a post or comment about your success because we can share iml files of PS2
images and the glory is it's only kilobytes, which means quick help with your problem on PS2 DVD5 games. Note CdvdGen 2.0 and
CdvdIml2iso is a must for these operations. Also you need preferably ISO Buster to extract files from the image and ISO Buster also shows the true order of the files so when you use CdvdGen 2.0 you can click and drag them in order because if not the game will not work. For those who haven't the foggiest idea what the heck I am talking about I apologize. This process can also be used on dual-layer games as well but a bit differently with the help of Apache 2 or 3...slater

QUICK HEADS UP BEFORE YOU DO ANYTHING OPEN NOTEPAD ON YOUR COMPUTER. GOTO FILE CLICK OPEN FILE OF TYPE CHOOSE ALL FILES FIND THE trae.iml FILE AND HIGHLIGHT AND OPEN SHOULD LOOK LIKE THIS:

 [SYS]
VERSION=1.00
MEDIA=DVD
TARGET=PS2
DISCVERSION=1.00
DATE=2007/06/08-12:26:25
[/SYS]

PSTYPE=2
DISCCODE=02
[/CUE]

**Change all the  I: to C: or whatever drive you extracted the Tomb Raider files to make sure the extracted folder is simply named New Folder if not right-click and rename New Folder-sorry for the confusion. I know you got an error code on CdvdIml2iso. This is how you fix it now follow the instructions. To make it simple keep it all on your C:
